PAAQ-1-mbr84h ntwc@noaa.gov 2012-10-12T00:39:54-00:00 Actual Alert WCATWC Public profile:CAP-TSU:1.1 mbr84h Geo Tsunami None Unknown Minor Unlikely TsunamiSystemCategory Information NWS West Coast/Alaska Tsunami Warning Center Palmer AK This is tsunami information statement for Alaska, British Columbia, Washington, Oregon, and California. This is tsunami information statement for Alaska, British Columbia, Washington, Oregon, and California. - Event details: Preliminary magnitude 6.7 (Mwp) earthquake / Lat: -5.098, Lon: 134.066 at 2012-10-12T00:31:29Z An information statement indicates that an earthquake has occurred, but does not pose a tsunami threat, or that a tsunami warning, advisory, or watch has been issued for another section of the ocean. Evaluation: Based on magnitude, location, and historic tsunami records, the earthquake was not sufficient to generate a tsunami damaging to California, Oregon, Washington, British Columbia, or Alaska.This will be the only statement issued for this event by the West Coast/Alaska Tsunami Warning Center unless additional information becomes available. Refer to the internet site wcatwc.arh.noaa.gov for more information. http://wcatwc.arh.noaa.gov/tsuPortal/events/PAAQ/2012/10/12/mbr84h/1/WEAK53/WEAK53.txt EventLocationName in the Aru Islands region, Indonesia EventPreliminaryMagnitude 6.7 EventPreliminaryMagnitudeType Mwp EventOriginTime 2012-10-12T00:31:29-00:00 EventDepth 24 kilometers EventLatLon -5.098,134.066 0.000 WEAK53 Public Tsunami
